title: Elias03r
author: Elias03r
content: Dont want to sell my 2k worth of both dogecoin (25 cent avg) and shiba inu xxxx3750 (avg), invested 3k in loopring (2.07 avg), doing uber eats to survive, waiting for unemployment, living in a tent by bryant park, how can I make money off NFT's? Any other economical gig I can do???Thanks....this Lad is severly struggling, covid made my job go out of business, 5K left in savings.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Try to get into freelancing platforms like fiverr and upwork to have some gigs. Having a job there will surely help to make ends meet.Aside from the two, there are other freelancing platforms where you can use your skills and work. I hope it helps and hopefully, you'll be able to find one and wish you to have a better situation.

comments.author: Mosharafhh
comments.body: You can invest or trade on market for double up your money!!Â  Bitcoin price is now more dump and its in a support level just check it for a while and invest on a good coin when its start pumping you can make your money double in this way better analysis market.

comments.author: Elias03r
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on May 10, 2022, 07:15:50 PMTry to get into freelancing platforms like fiverr and upwork to have some gigs. Having a job there will surely help to make ends meet.Aside from the two, there are other freelancing platforms where you can use your skills and work. I hope it helps and hopefully, you'll be able to find one and wish you to have a better situation.Thank you, Ive used fiverr before...works very slowly..not sure what niche is popular these days on there...Ive ordered tons of traffic offers on there when I used to do affiliate marketing, too bad CPA/PPC died during the pandemic.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 07:27:37 PM-snip-Please, If people ask you for Investing.Use your money wisely, one thing you should know. Never use any money form your financial need, I believe you don't have a lot of Fund Saving. My suggestion, better to stay focused to your jobs freelance first rather than Investing.Build your Fund Saving, until Investing Lost not gonna to effect your life.

comments.author: Elias03r
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on May 10, 2022, 07:41:21 PMQuote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 07:27:37 PM-snip-Please, If people ask you for Investing.Use your money wisely, one thing you should know. Never use any money form your financial need, I believe you don't have a lot of Fund Saving. My suggestion, better to stay focused to your jobs freelance first rather than Investing.Build your Fund Saving, until Investing Lost not gonna to effect your life.Yes, probably pay off credit card debt of 3K with my savings, I think removing/Reducing bills may be the right thing to do, Warren buffets wise words. Thank you.

comments.author: kaya11
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 07:46:15 PMQuote from: ryzaadit on May 10, 2022, 07:41:21 PMQuote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 07:27:37 PM-snip-Please, If people ask you for Investing.Use your money wisely, one thing you should know. Never use any money form your financial need, I believe you don't have a lot of Fund Saving. My suggestion, better to stay focused to your jobs freelance first rather than Investing.Build your Fund Saving, until Investing Lost not gonna to effect your life.Yes, probably pay off credit card debt of 3K with my savings, I think removing/Reducing bills may be the right thing to do, Warren buffets wise words. Thank you.Sounds a better plan, bills will slow you and will make it harder for you everyday so get rid of them. Are you single by any chance? If yes then you could easily make it out there, as there will be less liabilities. Well we have our own battles to win so good luck out there.

comments.body: Quote from: kaya11 on May 10, 2022, 07:52:04 PMQuote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 07:46:15 PMQuote from: ryzaadit on May 10, 2022, 07:41:21 PMQuote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 07:27:37 PM-snip-Please, If people ask you for Investing.Use your money wisely, one thing you should know. If yes then you could easily make it out there, as there will be less liabilities. Well we have our own battles to win so good luck out there.Thanks, guess is too soon to make money NFT related, tech is too "young"

comments.author: Razanm90
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 06:54:27 PMDont want to sell my 2k worth of both dogecoin (25 cent avg) and shiba inu xxxx3750 (avg), invested 3k in loopring (2.07 avg), doing uber eats to survive, waiting for unemployment, living in a tent by bryant park, how can I make money off NFT's? Any other economical gig I can do???Thanks....this Lad is severly struggling, covid made my job go out of business, 5K left in savings.In this situation, you must use your money wisely. Also, you can invest in NFT projects, I think that they have a great potential in the early future. I am involved in one interesting project right now. Thee have a great community that helps a lot of people and takes part in various project events. I can give you advice about investment, so you can write me a message. I would be glad to help you.

comments.author: Ararbermas
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on May 10, 2022, 07:15:50 PMTry to get into freelancing platforms like fiverr and upwork to have some gigs. Having a job there will surely help to make ends meet.Aside from the two, there are other freelancing platforms where you can use your skills and work. I hope it helps and hopefully, you'll be able to find one and wish you to have a better situation. yhup this one is a good recommendation OP instead of keep investing in crypto, and so that you don't need to spend another money from your savings as well, where in since you already have existing investments and probably that's enough. Anyways actually I've been using these platform and yes they're legit as long as you have skills and good looking profile that can get attention of some clients its all good and surely you can get a jon easily . So must try and don't spend your savings for another investment.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 06:54:27 PM~I wouldn't advise you to focus on crypto with that kind of situation. If the price seems ain't working out, just sell it. You need to meet your basic needs.If you have a marketable skill, you could get a lot of opportunity in Upwork, just like what others mentioned in here. I cannot say the same in Fiverr since I went inactive there for a while. Though I would still advise you to find jobs there in your local area first, so you would still have a stream of income to buy your needs. Take any sorts of jobs whether it would be a fast-food work or something.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: I'm sorry to hear about your difficult situation, but at such a difficult time investing in NFT is a way to make things worse. Now your investments will resemble gambling, where the risk will exceed any possible profit, and buying NFT is not the best investment either, especially if you don't know about this industry. Maybe soon the market will recover and you will be able to use cryptocurrencies to improve your financial situation, but if not, then what? Then you will lose even more money.

comments.author: aditasetia123
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on May 10, 2022, 10:34:43 PMI'm sorry to hear about your difficult situation, but at such a difficult time investing in NFT is a way to make things worse. Now your investments will resemble gambling, where the risk will exceed any possible profit, and buying NFT is not the best investment either, especially if you don't know about this industry. Maybe soon the market will recover and you will be able to use cryptocurrencies to improve your financial situation, but if not, then what? Then you will lose even more money.i am agree ,in hard situation we have to use our money carefully and never put it into place which is we dont know about it. not all NFT was legit project, very difficult to analize which project is worth to invest since we dont know team behind NFT project. maybe use our saving into safe portofolio could help us in this kind condition.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 09:00:03 PMThanks, guess is too soon to make money NFT related, tech is too "young"That totally depends with the hype, it's better to get payment some tokens rather than NFT. Even when you are creating your own NFT and it doesn't mean if you can sell it instantly. This asset was illiquid, it's not a recommended way to do that. Think about an alternative way rather than it. We are facing very difficult situation these days started from so many things got dumped to the bottom and many more. Even doing trade is very risky with chance for the market to go even deeper

comments.author: TheClownSong
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on May 10, 2022, 07:15:50 PMTry to get into freelancing platforms like fiverr and upwork to have some gigs. Having a job there will surely help to make ends meet.Aside from the two, there are other freelancing platforms where you can use your skills and work. I hope it helps and hopefully, you'll be able to find one and wish you to have a better situation.i am believe alot people have their online skill since covid 19 case occur, maybe they spend alot time while work from home by learning alot thing such as editing , affiliate marketing , social media marketing or other skills,designing or something else. we have alot opportunity by working online and this forum also give us that opportunity.alot thing we could do in around us as long as we didnt shame with our condition.

comments.author: Rengga Jati
comments.body: Quote from: Mosharafhh on May 10, 2022, 07:21:33 PMYou can invest or trade on market for double up your money!!Â  Bitcoin price is now more dump and its in a support level just check it for a while and invest on a good coin when its start pumping you can make your money double in this way better analysis market. It is not as easy as we think and never suggest to someone in this situation by seems promising double up the money. Because once they don't get it, they will blame everything, moreover if the price is decreased again. He needs money for daily life, not for long-term necessities.Quote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 06:54:27 PM...how can I make money off NFT's? First of all, I am so sorry to hear about your condition right now, hopefully, you can have a better job and life again.Actually, in your situation, it is too risky to put money in the NFT and also crypto investment or trade. Because we know that these two are risky and moreover currently the market seems to be very dropped easily. I agree more with @jossiel suggestion to seek that kind of platform.Or, if you are able to make some arts or other creative, you can check on the https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0Sometimes, there are some competitions or some services needed and probably you are suitable for the position or even can join the certain competitions

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 10, 2022, 06:54:27 PMDont want to sell my 2k worth of both dogecoin (25 cent avg) and shiba inu xxxx3750 (avg), invested 3k in loopring (2.07 avg), doing uber eats to survive, waiting for unemployment, living in a tent by bryant park, how can I make money off NFT's? Any other economical gig I can do???Thanks....this Lad is severly struggling, covid made my job go out of business, 5K left in savings. Find a stable job first so you won't be struggling for your finances. And when you have one, start investing what you can afford to lose. And make sure that you will never sell your dogecoin and shiba inu for a low value, hold them as much as you want. However, if you want to apply in some crypto gigs, enhance your talent first and build your skills. That way, you will surely be accepted.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: It's hard to find a solution for you these days but you need to know what skill you owned it. What you need to do to at least try to do some side job that will give you weekly salary. Writing an article was good enough when you join into the bounty campaign with stable token payment. I can't give you another solution and the market is also bearish, this is also reducing your investment as well. well covid and war were destroying everything

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: You could just look to save more crypto and go big into DeFi. I mean real big. Do some stable coin staking or liquidity provider staking, that's a better passive income, to me

However, if you want to apply in some crypto gigs, enhance your talent first and build your skills. That way, you will surely be accepted.Would be the best idea to be done first rather than on considering investment on something which is unsure specially dealing with crypto space.Also, he do still have 5k left which it would be still enoughfor him to find some job and able to process out things and on the time that he had some day job then this is the time he do consider on dealing with crypto on which at least he had ensured himself even if he do fails on crypto investment he do still able to survive since he does have a day job.
